SystemCodeDisplay (en)DefinitionJSONXML
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-1Very FitRobus, active, energetic and motivated
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-2WellNo active disease symptoms but less fit than category 1
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-3Managing WellMedical problems are well controlled, but not regularly active
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-4VulnerableNot dependent for daily help, but symptoms limit activities
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-5Mildly FrailNeed help with high order IADLs (finances, transportation, heavy housework)
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-6Moderately FrailNeed help with all outside activities and some housekeeping
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-7Severely FrailCompletely dependent for personal care
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-8Very Severely FrailCompletely dependent, approaching end of life
https://clinyqai.github.io/open-nursing-core-ig/CodeSystem/onc-observation-codes  cfs-9Terminally IllApproaching the end of life (life expectancy <6 months)
